resources.string: "We are a foundation that deals with everything that has to do with wine. For example, we organize a weekly evening to taste wine. Every week this evening is organized with a different theme. Furthermore, we organize annually different events to which all members are welcome. We also make a few ourselves wines that can be tasted and bought on every wine-tasting evening in our members' house. Since we already have 30 years of experience in this, we can still speak of a few top wines within our range. If you are interested in becoming a member, please read the 'Becoming a member' section. It explains how you can join your member make our union."

You can become a member by registering at our secretary. He is present at every test evening and event. You will be annual membership fee of 25 â‚¬ must be paid and you must enter some information. This will create a login and password with which you use this application will have the opportunity to register for events.
